com.raceup.ed.bms

Class Bms

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.raceup.ed.bms.stream.ArduinoSerial
      • com.raceup.ed.bms.Bms
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StartAndStop, gnu.io.SerialPortEventListener, java.lang.Runnable, java.util.EventListener

    public class Bms
extends ArduinoSerial
implements java.lang.Runnable, StartAndStop
    Battery management system (with multithreading support) Provides data from arduino serial port

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void pause()
      Pause reading data from serial
      void run()
      Monitoring BMS 1) read newest value from serial 2) updateOrFail series values in BMS model 3) loop
      void start()
      Start reading data from arduino serial, wrapping it in BmsValue or BmsLog and updating battery pack
      void stop()
      Close serial port and never re-open it

        Parameters:

        logger - logger to log new data
